channel.title: Favorite Oscillator?
channel.description:
Putting together a patch that I can trigger a nice deep synth note from a foot switch while I play guitar (note picked from a fader on my midi controller). Right now I'm just using the standard Osc/Tri with a second one slightly detuned for some growl.
Looking to try something different but theres so many in the library, figured I'd see what everyone's favorite/favorite combo is
Thanks!

item.title: Favorite Oscillator?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

If you are going for a bass synth sound, you want to use a square or sawtooth oscillator, followed by a 24db lowpassfilter. there are quite a few low pass filters available in the lib, I think the VCF by Johannes is quite good.

Read full topic
